RETINAL 
directed by LuÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­s Henrique Leal

"It [storytelling] does not aim to convey the pure essence of the thing, like information or a report. It sinks the thing into the life of the storyteller, in order to bring it out of him again. Thus traces of the storyteller cling to the story". Walter Benjamin.
